YesterdayDate.script: return function getFromDate(){     var date = new Date();     date.setDate(date.getDate() - 14);     var fromDate = (date.getMonth()+1 < 10 ? '0': '') + (date.getMonth()+1)    		 + '/' +  (date.getDate() < 10 ? + '0' : '') + date.getDate() + '/' + date.getFullYear();    return fromDate;   }
